name: Polar Wind
description: Envelop yourself in winter winds, instantly healing yourself and an ally within 12 meters for 3414 Health and healing yourself for an additional 413 Health every 1 second over 5 seconds. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  While the effect persists the winds pulse outwards, dealing 435 Frost Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.
effectLines: The initial heal also heals a nearby ally.
coefDescription: Envelop yourself in winter winds, instantly healing yourself and an ally within 12 meters for $1 Health and healing yourself for an additional $2 Health every 1 second over 5 seconds. This portion of the ability scales off your Max Health.  While the effect persists the winds pulse outwards, dealing $3 Frost Damage every 1 second to nearby enemies.
